website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking a no-nonsense document tube at a cheaper cost will find their match in this colorful model.
pros: Resistant to water and light for long-term document protection
Extends over 40 inches with a locking design to keep adjusted height in place
cons: The inside of the tube has a small ridge because of the expanding feature
Carrying strap is too short for some

customer_reviews.title: Not 3.3 inches inside, but 2.75.
customer_reviews.text: The inside measure at 3” not 3.3 inches, but the locking mechanism is inside the tube. It sticks out about 1/4 inch. That roughly gives the inside 2.75 inches. The locking mechanism is smooth, but you could snag thinner documents. Basically if your document(s) rolled up are bigger than 2.75 inches, this tube will not work. I have a work mat that is 3 inches. It will not go into the tube. Just sits on the rim. The tube will give if squeezed. If weight is put the tube, it may damage sensitive drawings, or documents. I can still us this tube, just not for what I really wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Short strap, long tube
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for transporting my research poster through airlines. Definitely more sturdy than the cardboard style and the expanding function works great. The short strap is the reason for knocking off a star - if you have the tube in a semi-lengthened position the strap does expand long enough to use over your shoulder and definitely not long enough to use over back. Definitely a drawback when having to carry this through several airports. Still it did get my poster to the conference unscathed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for Emerald City Comicon and not disappointed. Very durable and even out in the Seattle rain, nothing inside got wet. My 8 year old son wore it comfortably and on occasion, used it like a bazooka. The color is solid, I don't think it will fade.
customer_reviews.author: SStone

customer_reviews.title: Works great as re-purposed embroidery in progress storage tube.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive solution for storing a very large embroidery piece when I'm not working on it. Would obviously also work well for as intended as a document tube. (Daughter also thinks it would work well for an archery quiver - Not sure I agree with that one) Would definetly consider purchasing others of these for embroidery storage for works in progress as well as poster tubes.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryReader

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY
customer_reviews.text: As a fashion and design student, I love my tube. I can roll my patterns and stick them into the tube. I can walk in the rain, snow and know that my designs are safe. I'm also using it to for my fabric. Keeps my designs wrinkle free and my patterns safe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Strap is too short!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for conference posters and I like it a lot compared to cardboard tubes. I've convinced myself it's greener, too. The only gripe I have is that when the tube is fully extended, so is the strap. It doesn't leave much room to sling it over your shoulder. If you're a big person and you'll be using the tube at its maximum length, I might look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela S.

customer_reviews.title: Traveled with me across the country
customer_reviews.text: This tube has carried posters with me on planes around the country. It is still in one piece despite being shoved into a number of overhead carryon bins. I wish it had a longer shoulder strap, but this is a relatively minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Idiot900

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I found myself thrust into a setting where I had to transport posters over long distances. This poster tube is fantastic, keeping my precious paper project sung, despite all the potential dangers offered by long distance travel. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store posters and to take them with me when I attend conference. It can extend to a length that can fit most of the posters up to 5 ft height. I like the color and the plastic is strong enough that won't break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great durability!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the durability and expandiblity of this product. I ended up extending it about eight inches but I did extend it all the way just to see what it was capable of and the structure held up well. Getting my mats in and out is very easy. I will likely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Mair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I only wish the strap was a little longer. I can use it but my fiancé cannot
customer_reviews.author: Christie52

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to carry a poster for one of my poster presentations. The item worked well as my carry-on while flying, but one's ability to use it in this manner may be dependent on the size of the poster.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Easily holds mahjong table cover
customer_reviews.text: I use this tube to store and carry my mahjong table cover. It is lightweight and will adjust to any length I want. It is wonderful protection for my table cover between games.
customer_reviews.author: AZ golfer

customer_reviews.title: The tube itself works well enough. I travel quite ...
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself works well enough. I travel quite a bit so these get carried around all the time. Sadly the black ring that holds the nylon strap does not stay put. It makes it a bit of a pain to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mac.

customer_reviews.title: Expandable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for transporting or storing large documents w/o folding. Exands lengthwise as needed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Speck

customer_reviews.title: Strap is too short to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder strap isn't remotely long enough to sling it over your shoulder if you have the tube even halfway extended. The tube would only be useful for small posters that you might as well lay flat in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Dudycha

customer_reviews.title: Great carrying case for scientific posters
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case for scientific posters. It easily expands to hold a 36 inch tall poster, the strap is fairly comfortable, and the bright color makes it easily identifiable from a bunch of standard tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like that this poster tube arrived in time so that I can travel with a poster to a conference, but it arrived damaged (see photo). The top cap has a big crack that makes it nearly impossible to securely close the tube. It is still usable, it's just a bit inconvenient to have it not in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just what I needed. I store my range targets in the back of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable. A good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent value. The tube locks in at the size you want in about 1 inch increments. I have used it twice now on flights. Lightweight and durable. If I ever need another one I would buy this again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my intended use plus the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my intended use plus the fact that it is expandable allows for storage of many sizes of posters or prints.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Strap is way too short.
customer_reviews.text: The strap is way too short once the tube is extended to 3 foot length. There is no reason to not have more slack in the strap. Tube is of questionable durability. Also has a tendency to slip out of the configured lenth.
customer_reviews.author: Hujoe Bigs

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love it for taking targets to the range. They get there in once piece without tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Used to bring home 3 paintings to home. good quality
customer_reviews.author: shekhar kadam

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy, with a nice color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any con or game- never ruin a piece of paper again!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Boralsky

customer_reviews.title: Tube is easy to use, but the locking part when expanded is sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: Tube is easy to use, but the locking part when expanded is sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: melissa hummer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a video game colletor and have tons on posters.i love that you can extend it to fit any size now i can restvin peacr knowing that my posters will not get bent ,riped and damaged.alsi keeps them dry
customer_reviews.author: george king

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and affordable. Easy to expand. Strap convenient. Bright color is easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Andronaco

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Well built to carry all sorts of plans, prints with ease. And captures people’s attention immediately too.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Clough

customer_reviews.title: What Ever Size You Need
customer_reviews.text: Great tube because you can change the size to accommodate material you need to carry in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for house plans!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these over the years. I love the adjustable length. By far the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great protecting a poster for a convention
customer_reviews.text: Worked great protecting a poster for a convention. I like that it expands if needed. The sling made carrying it around easy. A few people asked where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend this poster tube
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY recommend this poster tube! It's very durable for travel (for bringing on as a carry-on and stuffing it into the overhead bins in airplanes!). I packed 2 large 3 ft x 4 ft posters into this tube. Strap stayed on perfectly. Size adjustable and easy to carry. Also love the blue color :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Tubular
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect a poster I am getting autographed at a convention next weekend. It's a nice, rigid container I'm sure will keep the poster from creasing. However, because it's expandable, on the inside of the tube there is a bump out, with ridges from the part of the tube that locks in place when it's extended. Because of this, you have to be extra careful putting your things in the tube. If the bottom gets caught on the lip during insertion, you're going to damage your items. They should have left the inside of the tube a smooth circle to protect your items, and made the bump out on the outside of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Bic

customer_reviews.title: Functional, durable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both this and a transparent tube to compare the two and pick which one I liked. The transparent one smelled like a sewer (even now, months later -- I think it's the plastic), and broke the second time I carried it (the strap's plastic connection just snapped while I walked to my car). In contrast, THIS tube has lasted very well. It's not shown any damage or deformation, it's easy to carry, and it fits the game mat perfectly. Do yourself a favor and pick this one over something fancy-look'n but shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Wazat

customer_reviews.title: Would be great with a longer strap
customer_reviews.text: Used this to drag a poster around the UK for a few weeks before a conference. What I like is that it has a removable cap under which you can place contact info. The strap though is ridiculous. If you extend the tube all the way to the max length, the strap is basically pulled to its max length, so it’s flat against the tube. So much for being able to carry it over your shoulder! I didn’t have it all the way extended and the strap was still too short to stay on my shoulder. Poster did arrive fairly well intact though.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was expecting too much from this product. I was hoping to find a poster tube that didn’t have any give when squeezed. The card box tubes that some bands provide give you 10x the durability. On the positive side, the strap was nice and the ability to protect in flash thunderstorms is nice. Ended up sending back and building my own for slightly less.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hauling plans around
customer_reviews.text: I use these to keep sets of plans in on our current projects in my truck. Sturdy and adjustable. Nice that they have a little clear cap on the top so you can put what project they are for on each tube and easily change it. They adjust to the sizes of plans we use (ARCH D and ARCH E).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for transporting diamond paintings!
customer_reviews.text: I recently completed a large canvas and wanted to take it to work for the day. The canvas fit with plenty of room, even on the smallest setting. I love the top area where you can place a label as well. Great product! 👍
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a storage solution for neoprene tabletop gaming mats. these tubes fit the bill. If you can roll them up tight enough, you can fit two 3x3 mats in one. Will purchase another if I acquire additional mats.
customer_reviews.author: PanchoX1

customer_reviews.title: Well thought design!
customer_reviews.text: Buy with confidence! If you travel with it, it can crush! So, carry with you with its own handle. Otherwise for home storage, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: It was just as expected and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for carrying a poster on a flight. It was just as expected and great for the price. The plastic is light but reasonably durable. It's very easy to adjust the length of the tube and the top is easy to screw on and off. The sling makes it easy to carry. I would highly recommend this poster tube.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Wet Weather Transport
customer_reviews.text: We use this to store a vinyl game mat. It expands to any length we need and keeps our mats dry when we transport it through wet weather. if something should happen to this, I would buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for my needs
customer_reviews.text: For that price, the quality is really good. I have used it for about 5 months; things are working well. I haven’t gotten any chance to try out its extended ability as I have no use for it but everything is doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Han Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been really useful for carrying my research poster around! I wish the strap were longer, but it’s doable. I like the blue because I don’t want to look like I’m carrying around something sketchy like a weapon (seriously, I felt safer carrying blue into the airport).
customer_reviews.author: HelpMeINeedDrB

customer_reviews.title: Great for large paper targets!
customer_reviews.text: I use the tube to hold my paper targets while traveling to the shooting range. It's expandable to fit even my largest targets. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: AZR2nut

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my blocking wires and the arms of by swift in. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction. Cap seals tight
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable size so I can custom fit to my projects. Sturdy construction. Cap seals tight. Love the adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I use it to store my archery arrows. It's a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhi R Proch

customer_reviews.title: I would've liked if it was able to extend little longer since ...
customer_reviews.text: I would've liked if it was able to extend little longer since for some posters the fit is just enough or very tight. The design was very matching to my liking though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for storage and transport
customer_reviews.text: I have a 36" x 54" tabletop gaming mat that is too soft to stand on its own when rolled up. This case works perfect for storage and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Chessex Mega-Mat
customer_reviews.text: Got this to hold my battle mat. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Winterhof

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit 47” high poster
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I thought I read other reviews suggesting this could fit a full size scientific conference poster when fully extended. It does not. It comes about 2-3 inches too short so just print your poster a few inches shorter (if you can specify) and should be fine. Otherwise sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Blood Bowl Pitches
customer_reviews.text: Great product for storing and transporting my Blood Bowl pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Franklyn J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says but the tops are so ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says but the tops are so thin they broke in shipment. I won't buy again I'll up grade to a stronger version.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: I needed to transport a rolled up oil painting in ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to transport a rolled up oil painting in my checked luggage and this tube worked perfectly. It is lightweight yet strong and completely protected the painting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good material. I use it to carry large maps to teach at Bible class. Very useful!!
customer_reviews.author: Ni Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchases
customer_reviews.text: Does the job at a modest cost. Second tube of this brand that I have purchased, but in different colors. Very happy with the purchases. Use one for roll-up tournament chess boards, and the other for maps.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Mahjong mat case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friends birthday present She will use it to carry her mahjong mat to our weekly games. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is reasonably priced and provides a secure environment for long term storage of large documents.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fills the need I have in transporting presentations around safely.
customer_reviews.author: hagrid

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming mats as well as documents
customer_reviews.text: Works great for very large gaming mats. Safe storage and easy to take to a tournament.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stuarti

customer_reviews.title: Strip is too short!
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself is not bad, but the strip is too short to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying targets in.
customer_reviews.text: I love to shoot targets but they are kind of expensive. The only way you can really carry them around is roll them up like a newspaper. They still get ripped and torn when handled carefully. This tube is the perfect answer for storing your targets in. Now I can buy my targets in bulk and save even more money. It is exactly what I needed for my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bassntwo

product_meta.title: Juvale Poster Tube, Expandable Blueprint, Document, Art Storage Hard Plastic Tube 24 to 40 inches with Adjustable Shoulder Strap Waterproof and Light Resistance Carrying Case (Blue)
product_meta.description: Protect your most valuable documents with this Blue Plastic Storage Tube from Juvale! This tube holder keeps documents, blueprints, and artwork safe from the environment. It is also made to be light and water resistant to keep your documents from fading. This tube is made of high quality plastic, ensuring that documents are stored in an airtight and durable container. Perfect for artists, illustrators, architects and hobbyists! Dimensions: 24.75 x 3.5 x 3.3 inches. Fully extended 40.25"
feature_bullets: Portable Storage Tube: The poster tubes are suitable for paper rolls, maps, large images, blueprints, documents and poster anything that you want to roll in instead of folding.
Adjustable Shoulder Strap: This poster tube has an adjustable belt that is suitable for use when it is fully extended.

Hard & Waterproof: This poster tube is made of hard plastic to protect contents from bending or creasing in transit. The document tube is also waterproof and light-resistant, protects your artworks, paper scrolls, documents, blue prints, plans from water and exposure from sun light.
Adjustable Strap: The Carrying case has an extra long shoulder strap that is comfortable for use even when the tube is fully extended.
Expandable: The document tube could expand from 24" up to 40" in order to fit for various dimensions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
